name: 3 Days At Sea
description:
3 Days At Sea
Stranded at sea with no chance of rescue. Take in the sights. Take in the sounds. At the end of the day, they're all you have left.

How To Play
WASD - Movement
Left Mouse Button/E - Interact

Credits 
All assets are either original assets created by myself or built into Unreal Engine 4.
*Audio sounds from ZapSplat.com and EpidemicSound.com
